programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: On distant planets, a royal messiah has been born who will restore order to the universe, but there are forces that don't want evil to be vanquished!

programme.title: Don't Knock Twice
programme.desc: A successful sculptor named Jess returns to the UK to rebuild her relationship with Chloe, the daughter she was forced to give up nine years ago. When she agrees to come and live with her, Jess learns that Chloe has not come to stay because she wants to get to know her mother again. She has come because she is scared that a supernatural curse has claimed the life of her boyfriend, Danny, and is now coming for her. Chloe and Danny made the mistake of visiting an abandoned house once home to a witch, that comes for you if you knock on the door.

programme.title: The Hallow
programme.desc: Adam Hitchens is a London-based conservationist, husband and father who has found himself struggling amidst fraught economic pressures at work. He decides to move his family from London to Ireland and to take a job surveying an Irish forest. He moves his family to a millhouse deep in the idyllic countryside of Ireland. When the family arrives, they get to work rebuilding their new home. They meet their neighbors, but not everyone approves of their arrival. The locals are unfriendly and begin to make them feel unwanted.(n)

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium.(n)

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife.(n)

programme.title: God Told Me To
programme.desc: A desperate man targets a wealthy family's home to steal from. He picks the wrong night to carry out his plans however, for a masked madman has gotten there first, imprisoned the family and lined the mansion with deadly traps.(n)

programme.title: Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: An engaged couple goes away with their friends to a remote cabin to celebrate their upcoming wedding but the weekend takes a horrifying turn when dark secrets and forbidden desires are revealed and what started as a celebration quickly descends into a bloody nightmare.(n)

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path.(n)

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them.(n)

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity.(n)

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent.(n)

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as the vampire Maximillian, the most undead dude in the 'hood. He also plays a paunchy preacher and a fast talking thug. Angela Basset plays the cop whose world is rocked by Maximillian's attempts to make her his mate for eternity. Kadeem Hardison plays the haplessly decaying vampire's sidekick who is forever losing things. Directed by Wes Craven.(n)

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.(n)

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half.(n)

programme.title: Down
programme.desc: When the express elevators in New York City's 102-story Millennium Building start to malfunction, elevator mechanics Mark (James Marshall) and Jeff (Eric Thal) are sent to find the cause. After a series of gruesome and deadly accidents occur, Mark joins forces with a reporter named Jennifer (Naomi Watts). As the death toll rises and the building is sealed off amid claims of terrorism, Mark and Jennifer attempt to unravel the secret behind the mysterious behavior of the elevator.(n)

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the first manned mission to Mars, commanded by Luke Graham (Don Cheadle), lands safely on the red planet, but is soon met with catastrophe. Haunted by a cryptic last message from Graham, NASA launches the Mars Recovery Mission to investigate and bring back survivors. Confronted with nearly insurmountable dangers, but propelled by deep friendship, the team finally lands on Mars and makes a discovery that explains everything.(n)

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: Marc and Fred go to war when they are refused a double bed at a Christian B&B. They win their court case and go back. Triumph turns to terror when a Russian neo-Nazi checks in. Their weekend of fun becomes a bloody battle.

programme.title: You, Me and Him
programme.desc: Two female lovers, one a career driven lawyer (Lucy Punch), the other a fun-loving, pot-smoking layabout (Faye Marsay), have an annoying Casanova neighbor (David Tennant). While neither woman ever wanted children, both end up pregnant, creating conflicts that cause each to re-examine their outlook on life and their relationship.

programme.title: CTRL
programme.desc: The Internet is an uncontrollable labyrinth of content and imagery that operates under loose laws and partial anonymity - a new frontier where people can do anything and see anything, whether they should or not. In this lawless landscape, who's in control? The protectors? The abusers? In this episode meet the content moderators who watch the worst of the Internet so you don't have to; a convicted hacker whose punishment was the virtual prison of the unplugged; plus, a blackhat hacker who encrypts and holds computer files hostage.

credits.writer: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).

programme.title: Perrier's Bounty
programme.desc: A Dublin ne'er-do-well (Cillian Murphy) tries to dodge his debt payment to a local crime lord (Brendan Gleeson) and ends up in deeper trouble than ever in this crime comedy costarring Jim Broadbent.

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses
programme.desc: In this buddy drama, a Vietnam vet and his grumpy yet lovable sidekick team up to find the killer of a young boxer and clean up the streets of LA only to be drawn into an international crime ring. Stars Danny Trejo and Danny Glover.

programme.title: Orny Adams: More Than Loud
programme.desc: In his new stand-up special, Orny Adams fluctuates between the relevant and the absurd, attacking what's wrong with the world and at times including what's wrong with him.

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: Without adopting the romantic and moralistic cliches that have crippled many other films about addiction, Gus Van Sant directs Matt Dillon, Kelly Lynch, James Le Gros and Heather Graham in one of the most influential films of the late 1980s. Bob (Dillon) is the leader of a small gang of junkies that robs pharmacies and hospitals for prescription drugs. Alas, Bob is now starting to feel the burden of responsibility as he watches over his band of misfits. Van Sant's joyous and exhilarating second feature is notable for its humor and bravery.

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity.

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis.

programme.title: Touchback
programme.desc: Former high school football star turned farmer and family man Scott Murphy (Brian Presley) finds himself with a unique opportunity to revisit the championship game where he permanently injured his knee in a game-winning play. Given a second shot at football fame, Scott seeks counsel from his longtime mentor, Coach Hand (Kurt Russell), to help him decide whether to let his fate unfold or follow a path that will change his future.

programme.title: The 4th
programme.desc: Jamie is a down-on-his-luck illustrator who's behind on rent and tries to throw a cookout while his overbearing roommate is out of town on the 4th of July. He decides to borrow his roommate's bike for a quick trip to buy lighter fluid, but his entire day and life quickly go up in smoke. After an incident with a road-rager, Jamie finds himself far from home and trapped in a series of awkward and infuriating situations with strangers.

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans.

programme.title: Certain Women
programme.desc: Michelle Williams, Kristen Stewart and Laura Dern star as three women striving to forge their own paths amidst the wide-open plains of the American Northwest. The lawyer (Dern) finds herself contending with both office sexism and a hostage situation. The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. The young law student (Stewart) forms an ambiguous bond with a lonely ranch hand (Lily Gladstone).

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Pop music sensation Britney Spears stars in this teen road-trip drama about a trio of high school pals that heads for the bright lights of Los Angeles, meeting up with both romance and loss along the way. Zoe Saldana, Taryn Manning, Anson Mount, Dan Aykroyd and Kim Cattrall costar in this film from director Tamra Davis ("Billy Madison").

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: The Internet promises us escape from reality. We can go places we never thought possible and express ourselves as never before. But as we sit in our homes surrounded by screens, are we free... and safe? In this episode meet a woman pulled into an online cult from the safety of her bedroom; a former pilot who suffers from Electromagnetic Hypersensitivity and can only find relief in the absence of electricity and wifi; plus, a quadriplegic who uses cutting-edge adaptive robotics and virtual reality to transcend his body's limitations.(c)

credits.writer: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: Without adopting the romantic and moralistic cliches that have crippled many other films about addiction, Gus Van Sant directs Matt Dillon, Kelly Lynch, James Le Gros and Heather Graham in one of the most influential films of the late 1980s. Bob (Dillon) is the leader of a small gang of junkies that robs pharmacies and hospitals for prescription drugs. Alas, Bob is now starting to feel the burden of responsibility as he watches over his band of misfits. Van Sant's joyous and exhilarating second feature is notable for its humor and bravery.

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path.

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room.

programme.title: W. Kamau Bell: Semi-Prominent Negro
programme.desc: Comedy special featuring socio-political comedian W. Kamau Bell, who brings his characteristically biting and hilarious take on the real issues of contemporary America from gentrification to raising his family in a post-Obama nation. Morgan Spurlock directs.

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: After she catches her husband cheating on her, a charming, flamboyant socialite packs her two young sons into a Coupe de Ville and embarks on a cross-country journey to find a new head of the family. Renee Zellweger, Logan Lerman and Kevin Bacon star in this comedy-drama loosely based on a true story.

programme.title: Texas Rangers
programme.desc: A ragtag group of youngsters band together after the American Civil War to form the Texas Rangers, a group charged with the duty of cleaning up the West.

programme.title: Rolling Stones: Sweet Summer Sun - Hyde Park Live
programme.desc: The biggest live show of the year: The Rolling Stones return to Hyde Park, London almost 44 years to the day after their legendary free concert in July 1969. Featuring their greatest hits across a career spanning 50 years, plus a special appearance by former Stones guitarist Mick Taylor. Highlights include 'Gimme Shelter,' 'Jumpin' Jack Flash,' 'You Can't Always Get What You Want' and '(I Can't Get No) Satisfaction.'.

programme.title: Mean Machine
programme.desc: British comedy starring Vinnie Jones as a combative professional soccer player whose incarceration on assault charges leads to the organization of a prison team, and a high-stakes match-up against the facility's guards. David Hemmings, David Kelly, Ralph Brown, Jason Flemyng, Jason Statham and Sally Phillips costar in this kicking cousin to the classic "The Longest Yard.".

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: Shot
programme.desc: Three lives are irrevocably changed when a gun is accidentally fired on a busy LA street. Mark (Noah Wyle) and Phoebe (Sharon Leal) are in the midst of a breakup. Miguel (Jorge Lendeborg, Jr.), a bullied teenager, is given an illegal gun by his cousin for protection. As Miguel handles it, the gun accidently fires and Mark is hit by the bullet.

programme.title: The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Gilby Smalls (Fran Kranz) is having a meltdown. He's just been fired from his job and his girlfriend gave him the boot. Forced to move in with May (Coleen Camp), his booze-swilling man-obsessed mother, he's desperate to turn things around. Gilby's luck seems to change when he meets Rachel (Odette Annable), the very thing Gilby needs to get his life back on track. Desperate to impress her, Gilby starts to weave a web of lies; one bigger than the next. Now in a sticky mess, Gilby is forced to face the uncomfortable truth about himself.

programme.title: Employee of the Month (2006)
programme.desc: A slacker box boy (Dane Cook) at a New Mexico superstore tries to impress a gorgeous new coworker (Jessica Simpson) by transforming himself into a model corporate drone, but runs up against the previous 17-time holder (Dax Shepard) of the store's "employee of the month" honor.

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: After she catches her husband cheating on her, a charming, flamboyant socialite packs her two young sons into a Coupe de Ville and embarks on a cross-country journey to find a new head of the family. Renee Zellweger, Logan Lerman and Kevin Bacon star in this comedy-drama loosely based on a true story.(n)

programme.title: Unsportsmanlike Comedy with Rob Gronkowski
programme.desc: Sports and comedy come together in this comedy special hosted by Rob Gronkowski himself and featuring the standup comedy of Juston McKinney, Finesse Mitchell, Jay Larson, John Caparulo and Lenny Clarke.(n)

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Employee of the Month (2006)
programme.desc: A slacker box boy (Dane Cook) at a New Mexico superstore tries to impress a gorgeous new coworker (Jessica Simpson) by transforming himself into a model corporate drone, but runs up against the previous 17-time holder (Dax Shepard) of the store's "employee of the month" honor.(n)

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions.(n)

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.(n)

programme.title: Risk
programme.desc: In the new world order where a single keystroke can alter history, WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange is undeterred - even as the legal jeopardy he faces threatens to undermine the organization he leads and fracture the movement he inspired. Capturing this story with unprecedented access, Academy Award® winning director Laura Poitras finds herself caught between the motives and contradictions of Assange and his inner circle in a documentary portrait of power, betrayal, truth and sacrifice.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: Blood and Chocolate
programme.desc: A teenage werewolf living in Bucharest falls in love with a visiting American artist and threatens the future of her entire species by pursuing the romance. Agnes Brucker, Hugh Dancy and Olivier Martinez star in this ominous, supernatural love story based on the novel by Annette Curtis Klause.(n)

programme.title: It Stains The Sands Red
programme.desc: In the throes of a zombie apocalypse, Molly - a troubled woman from Las Vegas with a dark past - finds herself stranded in the desert with a ravenous zombie on her tail. At first, she's easily able to outpace her undead pursuer, but things quickly become worse when she realizes the zombie doesn't need to ever stop and rest. Running low on supplies and beat down by the harsh environment, Molly must summon strength she never knew she had in order to face it.(n)

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: Michael and Joanna Reed (Sam Worthington and Keira Knightley) seem to have it all. Young, attractive and successful, they're a married couple who've lucked into spiritual and material well-being, sharing a comfortable life in their trendy Manhattan apartment. But when they attend one of Michael's work parties, Joanna witnesses a suspicious moment between her husband and his beautiful new co-worker, Laura (Eva Mendes). Joanna can't be sure what she did or didn't see - but it sows a powerful seed of doubt.(n)

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).(n)

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.

programme.title: Employee of the Month (2006)
programme.desc: A slacker box boy (Dane Cook) at a New Mexico superstore tries to impress a gorgeous new coworker (Jessica Simpson) by transforming himself into a model corporate drone, but runs up against the previous 17-time holder (Dax Shepard) of the store's "employee of the month" honor.

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife.

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children.

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Michael Douglas stars as a man who's chosen to participate in a live-action game that penetrates all aspects of his life. But when it begins to go out of control, he tries to escape. Directed by David Fincher.

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent.

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombing, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders (Mark Wahlberg) joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the bombers before they strike again. The stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon), Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman), Sergeant Jeffrey Pugliese (J.K. Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan) are all woven together to show the strength of the city.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children.

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful (La vita e bella)
programme.desc: Guido is a charming, bumbling Jewish waiter whose colorful imagination and playful spirit help him to woo a beautiful schoolteacher. The couple marries and has a young son, but before long, their idyllic world is threatened by Nazi soldiers who force the family into a concentration camp. Guido must now use his imagination again - this time to transform his son's tragic new surroundings into a magical wonderland.

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombing, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders (Mark Wahlberg) joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the bombers before they strike again. The stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon), Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman), Sergeant Jeffrey Pugliese (J.K. Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan) are all woven together to show the strength of the city.

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh.

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent.

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.

programme.title: A Dog's Purpose
programme.desc: A devoted dog (voiced by Josh Gad) finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he teaches to laugh and love. Also starring Dennis Quaid, Britt Robertson, K.J. Apa, Peggy Lipton and Pooch Hall.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: When a fuel leak threatens to strand three astronauts in space, the ground crew and the mission team must struggle to avert catastrophe. The team's solutions are ingenious, led by Academy Award winner Tom Hanks. Directed by Academy Award winner Ron Howard, this is the gripping true story of the 1970's ill-fated moon voyage.

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Elliot, his girlfriend Sasha, and their friend John move into an old house off campus for their last year in college. Almost immediately, Sasha begins to suspect there is something wrong with the home, and enlists her clairvoyant friend Kim to hold a séance. Prompted by a clue in the house, they attract the attention of The Bye Bye Man, an insidious supernatural figure who deceives and preys upon his victims before causing them to turn on those around them.

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.

programme.title: G.I. Jane
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars as gutsy Lieutenant O'Neil, the first woman ever given the opportunity to earn a place in the armed forces most highly skilled combat unit - the elite Navy SEALS. But the already brutal rigors of training camp turn into an unimaginable test of courage and determination once it becomes clear that no one - not powerful politicians, top military brass, or her male Navy SEAL teammates - wants her to succeed!

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: When a fuel leak threatens to strand three astronauts in space, the ground crew and the mission team must struggle to avert catastrophe. The team's solutions are ingenious, led by Academy Award winner Tom Hanks. Directed by Academy Award winner Ron Howard, this is the gripping true story of the 1970's ill-fated moon voyage.(n)

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: David Dunn (Bruce Willis) emerges from a horrific train crash without a single scratch on him. He meets a mysterious stranger (Samuel L. Jackson) whose obsession with David will change David's life forever.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Movie
programme.desc: A teenager suffering from the pain of lifelong virginity sets his sexual sights on his school's most popular girl in this raunchy sketch comedy featuring appearances from Michael Cera, Frankie Muniz and Beverly Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy.(n)

programme.title: Perrier's Bounty
programme.desc: A Dublin ne'er-do-well (Cillian Murphy) tries to dodge his debt payment to a local crime lord (Brendan Gleeson) and ends up in deeper trouble than ever in this crime comedy costarring Jim Broadbent.(n)

programme.title: What About Bob?
programme.desc: Comedy about a troubled but lovable therapy patient, Bob, who seeks help from a noted psychiatrist to find relief from his crippling fears. But when the psychiatrist goes on a quiet family vacation, Bob unexpectedly shows up at his lakeside retreat and won't leave. Stars Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss.(n)

programme.title: Gambler's Ballad: The Legend of Johnny Thompson
programme.desc: This film explores one of the greatest magicians and magic minds in history, Johnny Thompson. He teaches fellow magician Penn Jillette his signature piece called Gambler's Ballad.(n)

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: A paranormal expert moves into an abandoned house. It's populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one named Casper, who befriends his lonely daughter named Kat. Bill Pullman and Christina Ricci star.(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.(n)

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: In 24 short hours Monty (Edward Norton) goes to prison for seven years. Once a king of Manhattan, Monty is about to say good-bye to the life he knew. On his last day on the outside, Monty tries to reconnect with his father (Brian Cox) and gets together with his two old friends, Jacob (Philip Seymour Hoffman) and Slaughtery (Barry Pepper). There's also his girlfriend, Naturelle (Rosario Dawson), who may or may not have been the one who tipped off the cops.(n)

programme.title: Terminal Velocity
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars as Ditch Brodie, a daredevil skydiving instructor who falls hard when a sexy, mysterious beauty (Natassja Kinski) walks through his door looking for a lesson and then plunges to her death during a parachute jump. Suddenly, Brodie finds himself hurled headlong into a nightmare world of intrigue and deceit - caught in a deadly game of cat and mouse with the Russian mafia.(n)

programme.title: The Weather Man
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this comedy-drama as a Chicago weather man whose personal life enters free-fall even as his career is potentially about to take off with a new job on a national television morning show. Michael Caine and Hope Davis costar in this film from director Gore Verbinski ("The Ring," "Pirates of the Caribbean").(n)

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.(n)

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Oz (Matthew Perry) is a miserable dentist living with Sophie (Rosanna Arquette), his shrew of a wife. Things get even worse when hitman Jimmy "The Tulip" (Bruce Willis) moves in next door. Sent by Sophie to Chicago to rat out Jimmy to the Gogalak gang, Oz meets and falls in love with Cynthia (Natasha Henstridge), Jimmy's estranged wife. Oz returns home only to discover Sophie's hired Jill (Amanda Peet), his perky dental hygienist, to kill him.(n)

programme.title: SCB: Hurd vs. Molina
programme.desc: In anticipation of the upcoming unification battle between Erislandy Lara and Jarrett Hurd, relive Hurd making a final round splash against undefeated Olympian Oscar Molina.

programme.title: SCB: Lara vs. Gausha
programme.desc: In anticipation of the upcoming unification battle between Erislandy Lara and Jarrett Hurd, relive the division's longest reigning champion defending his title against Olympian Terrell Gausha.

programme.title: Eddie Griffin: Undeniable
programme.desc: This comedy special is Griffin's magnum opus about the world, relationships and humanity as a whole. He celebrates his 30-year anniversary in comedy by being on stage and pulling laughter from his fans during the live taping.

programme.title: Daddy's Sexy Mistress
programme.desc: Danny finds some of his father's belongings, including love letters and pictures of his dad with an unknown woman. He quickly realizes that there is another side to the father he barely knew. Intrigued, he sets out to find answers for himself. He tracks down Nina and decides to go to New York to meet this mystery woman. Now, the two find themselves inexplicably drawn to each other. Pandora's Box has been opened, and there's no closing it.

programme.title: God Told Me To
programme.desc: A desperate man targets a wealthy family's home to steal from. He picks the wrong night to carry out his plans however, for a masked madman has gotten there first, imprisoned the family and lined the mansion with deadly traps.

programme.title: Get The Gringo
programme.desc: An already bad day for Driver is not getting any better. He makes a big haul of millions that would give him a nice summer vacation on easy street, but it goes south - literally. During a high-speed car chase with the US Border Patrol and a bleeding body in his back seat, Driver flips his car smashing through the border wall, tumbling violently, coming to a stop in Mexico. Apprehended by the Mexican authorities, he is sent to a hard-core prison where he enters the strange and dangerous world of "El Pueblito". Starring Mel Gibson.

programme.title: Rolling Stones: Sweet Summer Sun - Hyde Park Live
programme.desc: The biggest live show of the year: The Rolling Stones return to Hyde Park, London almost 44 years to the day after their legendary free concert in July 1969. Featuring their greatest hits across a career spanning 50 years, plus a special appearance by former Stones guitarist Mick Taylor. Highlights include 'Gimme Shelter,' 'Jumpin' Jack Flash,' 'You Can't Always Get What You Want' and '(I Can't Get No) Satisfaction.'.

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: On distant planets, a royal messiah has been born who will restore order to the universe, but there are forces that don't want evil to be vanquished!

programme.title: Operation Odessa
programme.desc: This is a true crime documentary featuring a Russian mobster, a Miami playboy and a Cuban spy who sold a Soviet submarine to a Colombian drug cartel for $35 million. A mid-'90s gangster epic that hopscotches from Brooklyn to Miami and Cali to Moscow, the film tells the story of three friends who set out to hustle the Russian mob, the Cali cartel and the DEA for the score of a lifetime.

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: In 24 short hours Monty (Edward Norton) goes to prison for seven years. Once a king of Manhattan, Monty is about to say good-bye to the life he knew. On his last day on the outside, Monty tries to reconnect with his father (Brian Cox) and gets together with his two old friends, Jacob (Philip Seymour Hoffman) and Slaughtery (Barry Pepper). There's also his girlfriend, Naturelle (Rosario Dawson), who may or may not have been the one who tipped off the cops.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: Daniel Craig stars as a dealer that has made a fortune selling cocaine and ecstasy. Now he's looking to retire while he's young enough to enjoy his gains. Crime boss Jimmy Price (Kenneth Cranham) needs a couple of favors first. The drug addict daughter of a mob overlord (Michael Gambon) has gone missing and Price wants her tracked down. Price also wants a middleman to buy a huge shipment of ecstasy from a loose-cannon crook called The Duke (Jamie Foreman).

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: David Dunn (Bruce Willis) emerges from a horrific train crash without a single scratch on him. He meets a mysterious stranger (Samuel L. Jackson) whose obsession with David will change David's life forever.

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: High School senior Cayden Richards must flee his small town after the murder of his parents leaves him as a prime suspect. He wanders without purpose until he meets Wild Joe, a violent lunatic who sets Cayden on a path to the truth.

programme.title: Operation Odessa
programme.desc: This is a true crime documentary featuring a Russian mobster, a Miami playboy and a Cuban spy who sold a Soviet submarine to a Colombian drug cartel for $35 million. A mid-'90s gangster epic that hopscotches from Brooklyn to Miami and Cali to Moscow, the film tells the story of three friends who set out to hustle the Russian mob, the Cali cartel and the DEA for the score of a lifetime.

programme.title: Robocop
programme.desc: When an honest cop (Peter Weller) is killed in the line of duty, the embattled Detroit Police Department of the future brings him back to life as RoboCop, the latest in cyborg technology. Programmed to be the ultimate law enforcer, RoboCop's not supposed to remember his human past - but memories of life, love and family are flooding in, blurring the line between man and machine, even as RoboCop sweeps the streets of "scum." Nancy Allen, Kurtwood Smith and Ronny Cox costar in this sci-fi blockbuster.

programme.title: Lara vs. Trout
programme.desc: In anticipation of the upcoming unification battle between Erislandy Lara and Jarrett Hurd, relive the division's longest reigning champion in this classic match-up against Austin Trout.(c)

programme.title: SCB: Hurd vs. Trout
programme.desc: In anticipation of the upcoming unification battle between Erislandy Lara and Jarrett Hurd, relive Hurd defending his title for the first time against Austin "No Doubt" Trout.(c)

programme.title: Dude Bro Party Massacre III
programme.desc: Brent enters the halls of the Delta Bi Theta fraternity. He isn't just any pledge, he's a legacy - and it's a legacy of death. Brent is actually there to solve the mystery of his identical twin brother Brock's murder, and he'll do anything to crack the case, including an attempt at the frat's most daring prank of all time. After the prank causes two commercial jets to collide over an orphanage, they're punished to a weekend at The Old Sorority House by the Lake. But they're not the only ones there, a killer named Motherface lurks nearby.

programme.title: Play It to the Bone
programme.desc: Best buddies and sparring partners, Vince (Woody Harrelson) and Cesar (Antonio Banderas) are a pair of worn-out, over-the-hill prizefighters who jump at one last chance to work in the big time. They just have to get to Las Vegas first. When they finally step into the ring, friendship is replaced by fierce competition as Vince and Cesar tangle in a dramatic fight to the finish.

programme.title: Robocop
programme.desc: When an honest cop (Peter Weller) is killed in the line of duty, the embattled Detroit Police Department of the future brings him back to life as RoboCop, the latest in cyborg technology. Programmed to be the ultimate law enforcer, RoboCop's not supposed to remember his human past - but memories of life, love and family are flooding in, blurring the line between man and machine, even as RoboCop sweeps the streets of "scum." Nancy Allen, Kurtwood Smith and Ronny Cox costar in this sci-fi blockbuster.

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary examining the 2003 murder of college basketball star Patrick Dennehy by teammate Carlton Dotson, and the subsequent accusations against both Baylor University and head coach Dave Bliss.

programme.title: Double Take
programme.desc: Framed in a multimillion-dollar laundering scheme, upstanding investment banker Daryl (Orlando Jones) suddenly finds himself running from the FBI and swapping identities with petty thief Freddy (Eddie Griffin). As he dashes for the Mexican border in search of the one man who can clear his name, Daryl discovers his new alias is even more wanted than he is.

programme.title: March 2018
programme.desc: Unflinching, unpredictable and utterly unfiltered, former UFC fighter, comedian and award-winning podcaster, Brendan Schaub explores the latest news in combat sports and pop culture in a first-of-its-kind sports talk show. Featuring interviews with the biggest names in combat sports and entertainment, road trips, fight camp visits, animation and pop culture spoofs. Series premiere.(c)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Robert De Niro directs this story of a young CIA agent during the Cold War whose dedication to work costs him his innocence and his soul. Academy Award winners Matt Damon and Angelina Jolie also star.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: In the midst of a global crisis, the USS Alabama receives an unconfirmed order to launch its nuclear missiles - signaling the start of World War III. The tension quickly rises as the sub's respected commander (Gene Hackman) and his brilliant executive officer (Denzel Washington) clash over the validity of their orders, battling each other for control of the sub. Also starring Viggo Mortensen and James Gandolfini.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Thomas Jane ("Deep Blue Sea," "Dreamcatcher") steps into the steel-tipped boots of Marvel Comics hero Frank Castle, a.k.a. The Punisher, a crusading vigilante out to topple the crime czar (John Travolta) who murdered his family. Rebecca Romijn, Ben Foster, Samantha Mathis, Roy Scheider and Will Patton costar in this crackling adaptation from writer/director Jonathan Hensleigh ("Jumanji," "Armageddon").(n)

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The iron-willed comic book vigilante Frank Castle (a.k.a. "The Punisher") wages a one-man war on the New York mobsters that murdered his family in this action thriller starring Ray Stevenson, Dominic West and Julie Benz.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.(n)

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Lavell is back home in St. Louis in his new comedy special. He discusses every holiday from what Christmas was like when he was a kid, to the guilt everyone feels on Mother's Day, to Thanksgiving and his family trips to Disneyland.(n)

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing: Lara vs. Hurd (?)
Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse.(n)

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: On distant planets, a royal messiah has been born who will restore order to the universe, but there are forces that don't want evil to be vanquished!(n)

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: A vengeful game of one-upmanship turns deadly in this urban thriller about a hotshot young attorney (Ben Affleck) and a recovering alcoholic (Samuel L. Jackson) whose minor fender-bender devastates both of their lives and quickly leads to an escalating war of dirty tricks and manipulation. William Hurt, Toni Collette, Dylan Baker, Amanda Peet and Sydney Pollack costar in this provocative, acclaimed film from director Roger Michell ("Notting Hill").(n)

programme.title: Texas Rangers
programme.desc: A ragtag group of youngsters band together after the American Civil War to form the Texas Rangers, a group charged with the duty of cleaning up the West.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow has a blood debt to pay. He owes his soul to the ghastly Davy Jones unless he can cheat death - and eternal damnation - by seizing the fabled Dead Man's Chest. Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom and Keira Knightley star.(n)

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombing, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders (Mark Wahlberg) joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the bombers before they strike again. The stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon), Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman), Sergeant Jeffrey Pugliese (J.K. Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan) are all woven together to show the strength of the city.(n)

programme.title: Get The Gringo
programme.desc: An already bad day for Driver is not getting any better. He makes a big haul of millions that would give him a nice summer vacation on easy street, but it goes south - literally. During a high-speed car chase with the US Border Patrol and a bleeding body in his back seat, Driver flips his car smashing through the border wall, tumbling violently, coming to a stop in Mexico. Apprehended by the Mexican authorities, he is sent to a hard-core prison where he enters the strange and dangerous world of "El Pueblito". Starring Mel Gibson.(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms.

programme.title: What About Bob?
programme.desc: Comedy about a troubled but lovable therapy patient, Bob, who seeks help from a noted psychiatrist to find relief from his crippling fears. But when the psychiatrist goes on a quiet family vacation, Bob unexpectedly shows up at his lakeside retreat and won't leave. Stars Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss.

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself.

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later.

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration.

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: When a brilliant video game maker named Flynn (Jeff Bridges) hacks the mainframe of his ex-employer, he is beamed inside a digital world and becomes part of the very game he is designing.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest. Of All Time.
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, after his recent and high profile defeat to Larry Holmes, boxing legend Muhammad Ali takes it upon himself to talk a suicidal stranger down from a ledge. Using his unique brand of wit and wisdom, he succeeds in persuading the man that life is worth living, and learns a huge amount about himself in the process. Starring Noel Clarke as Muhammad Ali, Osy Ikhile as Joe, Lucian Msamati as Herbert Muhammad and Danny John-Jules as Don King.

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship.

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues.

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury.

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: A paranormal expert moves into an abandoned house. It's populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one named Casper, who befriends his lonely daughter named Kat. Bill Pullman and Christina Ricci star.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct.

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: Sci-fi action highlights this breezy fantasy starring Jesse Bradford as Zak Gibbs, a high school student who "borrows" the latest invention of his scientist dad, a "hyper-time" device that impresses a pretty exchange student (Paula Garces) but also attracts the attention of a sinister government agent (Michael Biehn). French Stewart and Julia Sweeney costar in this teen adventure in the tradition of "Back to the Future.".

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: When a brilliant video game maker named Flynn (Jeff Bridges) hacks the mainframe of his ex-employer, he is beamed inside a digital world and becomes part of the very game he is designing.

programme.title: Despite the Falling Snow
programme.desc: In 1950s Moscow, communist Katya secretly spies for the Americans in the Cold War arms race. When she lands her biggest assignment, stealing secrets from rising government star Alexander, the last thing she expects is to fall in love with him. Reconciling her passion for him with her beliefs about communism means making the greatest sacrifice, a sacrifice that Alexander only uncovers thirty years later.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: A paranormal expert moves into an abandoned house. It's populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one named Casper, who befriends his lonely daughter named Kat. Bill Pullman and Christina Ricci star.

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half.

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder.

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs.

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship.

programme.title: Touchback
programme.desc: Former high school football star turned farmer and family man Scott Murphy (Brian Presley) finds himself with a unique opportunity to revisit the championship game where he permanently injured his knee in a game-winning play. Given a second shot at football fame, Scott seeks counsel from his longtime mentor, Coach Hand (Kurt Russell), to help him decide whether to let his fate unfold or follow a path that will change his future.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.(n)

programme.title: Return To Me
programme.desc: After he suffers the devastating loss of his beloved wife Elizabeth, a Chicago building contractor (David Duchovny) unknowingly falls in love with the woman (Minnie Driver) who received Elizabeth's transplanted heart. Carroll O'Connor, James Belushi, Robert Loggia, Joely Richardson, David Alan Grier and Bonnie Hunt (who also wrote and directed) costar in this charming romantic comedy-drama.(n)

programme.title: Encino Man
programme.desc: Two high school buddies dig up a frozen caveman in their backyard. Once the living fossil thaws out, the friends realize he's their ticket to being cool. Starring Pauly Shore, Sean Astin and Brendan Fraser.(n)

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication.(n)

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.(n)

programme.title: Osama
programme.desc: The first major motion picture to emerge from Afghanistan following the fall of the repressive Taliban regime is the story of a young girl (Marina Golbahari) struggling to survive in the early days of the Taliban's patriarchal rule by disguising herself as a boy. Siddiq Barmak's powerful drama won the Golden Globe for Best Foreign Language Film and an honorable mention at the Cannes Film Festival.(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms.(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later.(n)

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest. Of All Time.
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, after his recent and high profile defeat to Larry Holmes, boxing legend Muhammad Ali takes it upon himself to talk a suicidal stranger down from a ledge. Using his unique brand of wit and wisdom, he succeeds in persuading the man that life is worth living, and learns a huge amount about himself in the process. Starring Noel Clarke as Muhammad Ali, Osy Ikhile as Joe, Lucian Msamati as Herbert Muhammad and Danny John-Jules as Don King.(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world.(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer.(n)

programme.title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
programme.desc: A ten-year-old genius inventor must rally his neighborhood pals to build an armada of spaceships and rescue their parents from a goopy alien race in time for dinner in this computer-animated box office blockbuster from Nickelodeon. Featuring the voices of Martin Short, Andrea Martin and Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms.(n)

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.(n)

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: As an idealistic college professor (Robert Redford) attempts to ignite the spark of genius he sees in a lazy, privileged student, two of his former pupils fight for their lives behind enemy lines in Afghanistan, and a slick congressman (Tom Cruise) attempts to sell a skeptical journalist (Meryl Streep) on his new plans for the ongoing War on Terror. Michael Pena and Derek Luke costar with Andrew Garfield in this topical, provocative drama, directed by Redford.
Belle's feelings for Alex being to affect her work performance, and the timing of her problem couldn't possibly be worse.

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: It Stains The Sands Red
programme.desc: In the throes of a zombie apocalypse, Molly - a troubled woman from Las Vegas with a dark past - finds herself stranded in the desert with a ravenous zombie on her tail. At first, she's easily able to outpace her undead pursuer, but things quickly become worse when she realizes the zombie doesn't need to ever stop and rest. Running low on supplies and beat down by the harsh environment, Molly must summon strength she never knew she had in order to face it.

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them.

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated.

programme.title: Momma
programme.desc: A nine-year-old boy living in a trailer park carries on with his schoolwork and daily chores petrified at the thought of being taken away from his mother.

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: As an idealistic college professor (Robert Redford) attempts to ignite the spark of genius he sees in a lazy, privileged student, two of his former pupils fight for their lives behind enemy lines in Afghanistan, and a slick congressman (Tom Cruise) attempts to sell a skeptical journalist (Meryl Streep) on his new plans for the ongoing War on Terror. Michael Pena and Derek Luke costar with Andrew Garfield in this topical, provocative drama, directed by Redford.

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.

programme.title: Motherhood
programme.desc: A Manhattan mother of two finds herself in the midst of an epic, soul-crushing struggle when she sets out on a seemingly simple mission: arrange her two-year-old child's birthday party. Uma Thurman, Minnie Driver and Anthony Edwards star in this comedy about a "day from Hell.".

programme.title: My One and Only
